values:
Egh, I hate being so uncomfortable, its like everywhere I turn someone always thinks about that subject. I just want to get away from that, or at least make people forget so I can get back to my life. I hate being around Lana knowing that she's not comfortable around me, I mean, we're friends. 
  Why did I have to do it? It... I... I don't know how to feel, this is no good. Clark probably hates me, he's in love with Lana, I know it. I'm still not sure how I really feel, I've always had a thing for him, but I think... I know he doesn't feel the same way; he can't.


Everything has turned into doubt.

 -Chloe
